content: a simple garter stitch slipper pattern knitted flat and seamed with neat crocheted finishing the pattern is written for women s size large but the size is easily customized the pattern calls for two small skeins of fingering weight sock yarn these yarns are held double note the opportunity to use up your sock yarn scraps and thus can be replaced with a single strand of worsted weight yarn *** for instructions on how to start with a seamless cast-on please see this thread 1 for instructions on the three-needle bind-off please see this 2 and this 3 thread for help with the crochet seam please see this thread 4 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/patterns/2820342/1-25#14 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/patterns/2825078/1-25 3 http //www ravelry com/discuss/patterns/2961665/1-25#1 4 http //www ravelry com/discuss/patterns/3282603/1-25
